JoinSplashInfo.Subtitle: BI Remake Preview
JoinSplashInfo.Title: Step into the new Build Island

Sections.Title: Recent Updates for BI:
Sections.Body: • Spawn changess</br>• New compressor for savings system

Content.Body: The new Build Island features a more stable and reliable experience, most notably with the saving system. We are working on improving it and feedback would be greatly appreciated.
